front.title: MPLS Forwarding Benchmarking Methodology for IP Flows

abstract.t: This document describes a methodology specific to the benchmarking of Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) forwarding devices, limited to the most common MPLS packet forwarding scenarios and delay measurements for each, considering IP flows. It builds upon the tenets set forth in RFC2544, RFC1242 and other IETF Benchmarking Methodology Working Group (BMWG) efforts. This document seeks to extend these efforts to the MPLS paradigm.
